file_insights.purpose: Error boundary component for catching React errors

patterns_discovered.description: Uses React's class component pattern with getDerivedStateFromError and componentDidCatch lifecycle methods
Supports optional custom fallback UI via props, with a default Material-UI based error display
Shows detailed error information (message and component stack) only in development mode
patterns_discovered.location: isDevelopment condition and error details section

patterns_discovered.description: Leverages MUI components (Box, Container, Alert, Typography, Button) for consistent styling
Logs caught errors to console for debugging purposes

gotchas_discovered.description: Error boundaries only catch errors in child components, not in event handlers or async code. This component handles synchronous render errors but not promise rejections or timeout errors.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Document the limitations and consider pairing with global error handlers for uncaught promise rejections

gotchas_discovered.description: Uses import.meta.env.DEV which is specific to Vite. This may not work in other build systems.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Ensure project uses Vite or update to use the appropriate build system's environment detection

gotchas_discovered.description: The reload button triggers window.location.reload() which causes a full page refresh, potentially losing unsaved state.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider implementing a more graceful recovery mechanism that resets state instead of reloading

gotchas_discovered.description: Long component stacks could exceed the maxHeight of 200px, requiring user scrolling. No visual indicator of overflow is present.
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Add visual feedback (e.g., scroll hint) or truncate very long stacks

approach_outcome.summary: ErrorBoundary component successfully created with comprehensive error handling and fallback UI
achievements: Implemented proper TypeScript interfaces for props and state
Used React class component pattern correctly for error boundary
Integrated Material-UI components for professional error display
Included environment-aware error details for developer debugging
Provided optional custom fallback UI via props

recommendations.recommendation: Implement a reset mechanism that clears error state without full page reload
recommendations.rationale: Allows users to recover from errors without losing application state

recommendations.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments explaining the component's limitations and async error handling gaps
recommendations.rationale: Developers need to understand that this only catches render errors, not runtime errors in handlers or promises

recommendations.recommendation: Add error tracking/reporting integration (e.g., Sentry) in componentDidCatch
recommendations.rationale: Would help with production error monitoring and analytics

recommendations.recommendation: Create unit tests covering error catching, fallback rendering, and development vs production mode
recommendations.rationale: Ensures error boundary behaves correctly across different scenarios

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding contact support or error reporting buttons alongside the reload button
recommendations.rationale: Improves user experience when encountering errors by providing additional support options
